climbs.name: Depth Charge
climbs.fa: Envisioned by Stokeman B-rad, FA Tyler Rackelmann

content.description: Start high on crimp hugs, and follow the obvious crimp rail up and left to a gritty topout. This is mossy and licheny. It can be climbed without killing the plants. This will be sick if it just gets cleaned up a bit. Give the plants a chance!
content.location:
On the big, obvious, rhino-shaped boulder in Campsite 2 off the main road just past the pit toilet at the Nautilus parking area, the climb is located just right of the black streak from decades of campfire smoke. It faces north(ish), so it gets some afternoon/evening sun.

To get off, I jumped off the backside off a horn, but downclimbing and jumping off the way you come up is probably the same. A pad will do it if youâ€™re coordinated and your knees are healthy.
